thread.title: Ground News - Surprising a dedicated clerk at the Richmond Courthouse
thread.title_full: Ground News - Surprising a dedicated clerk at the Richmond Courthouse

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Surprising a dedicated clerk at the Richmond Courthouse
text:
Summary by Ground News Sheila Frye currently serves as a clerk with Richmond General District Court. Clerks are the record keepers of critical information, facilitate legal proceedings. Frye said her favorite part of the job is helping others, resolving issues, and getting to work with her colleagues. Share menu More

Scripps Company Surprising a dedicated clerk at the Richmond Courthouse RICHMOND, Va When you think of court, you might picture a judge, lawyers, and a jury. But just as critical to the judicial system are the people who work behind the scenes.Sheila Frye currently serves as a clerk with Richmond General District Court and plays a vital role in ensuring people have a smooth and positive experience navigating the legal system.
